data.text: This community based website is the best place to post a report about your neighbor, colleague, contractor, or business partner. Your opinion is important for our community. To make your report useful, please follow these recommendations: when you report a person, please include all meaningful details. Reports like "this guy is awful!" or "this guy rocks!" tell nothing. e specific, constructive and objective in your report avoid unfounded accusations, don't spread rumors, tell your story, share your own experience avoid spam and/or self promotion. There is no value in that
